description: The New York Times Best Sellers are up-to-date and authoritative lists of the most popular books in the United States, based on sales in the past week, including fiction, non-fiction, paperbacks, children’s books, audiobooks, graphic books and more.
title: Hardcover Nonfiction
title_page: Hardcover Nonfiction Books - Best Sellers - Books - Aug. 11, 2019
maintext:
A version of this list appears in the August 11, 2019 issue of The New York Times Book Review. Rankings on weekly lists reflect sales for the week ending July 27, 2019 . Lists are published early online.
